title: Cannon Fodder Scum Gong’s Whitewashing Manual - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Childcare   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Military   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Revenge   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Seme Protagonist   Showbiz   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 期期小风
description:
Chu Yan completed every cannon fodder scum gong in the dog-blooded abuse novel very well.

Cheating on marriage, raising a lover outside, cheating for money and sex…

But when he left contentedly, these Shous who should’ve waved goodbye to him to find true love all blackened…

Shou: I quit! I don’t want the original gong!

System: Brother Chu, please go back and abuse them again, but can you have a happy ending...>
